article_authors.name: Beck Regan
article_authors.description: is a second-year medical student at the Virginia Commonwealth University School of Medicine in Richmond. They are a student in the Family Medicine Scholars Training and Admission Tract interested in health care access, transgender health care, and mountain biking.
